LAND_ASSESS.description: If the assessment was copied from a previous assessment and not directly loaded from a tape or entered by a user this flag will have a value of 1, otherwise it will have a value of 0. This usually happen when a property is on a lease and the tax is prorated due to the start date and/or end date is different from the original assessment.  In this case, since the assessed value of the property has not been changed, the roll that BCA send will

If the prorate factor is overrided from the calculated amount by the user, this flag is set to 1, else it is 0. Mandatory. Valid values are 0 or 1. User or system entered. <ANON_RULE>DO NOTHING</ANON_RULE>

LAND_DDE_QUERY.description: A system generated id that is placed on all entries that are part of the same map query. It is used to link back into the land system GISLINK column to bring up the properties on the inquiry.

LAND_PDAT_ATTRIBUTES.description: Unique ID for attributes loaded from a property data file. Unique, Mandatory.
Property ID of the property that the attribute is related to. Mandatory.
File Id of the property data file the attribute is part of. Mandatory.

When special or custom processing is required on an attribute Tempest will assign that attribute a unique reference.  Site are instructed to then assign this reference to the attribute that they have set up that stores the information the processing is based on. Predefined list for each system.  The lists are created by a SQL statement in each system.  Always reference that statement for an up to date list of reference values.
Tells the system what type of data is being stored. Ths then controls which columns will be used on the land_attribute table. None
Value for the loaded attribute if it is a string. None
Value for the loaded attribute if it is a number. None
Value for the loaded attribute if it is a date.
For attributes where the description is user enterable this is the description that the user entered.  If the description is not enterable this column is left NULL. None None
This is the date and time that the record was last changed. Mandatory.
This is the userid of the person who last changed this record. Mandatory. Page: 74 System: LAND

LAND_THEMES.description: Theme name.  A theme is used to group the searches available to the land inquiry program.
